meanings.definition: An examination to assess one's health or progress.
meanings.sent1: I had a checkup at the doctor's office.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a checkup every six months.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the vet's checkup is a fun adventure.
meanings.sent4: Getting a checkup is like giving your body a tune-up.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget your annual checkup to stay healthy!

meanings.sent1: The mechanic performed a checkup on my car.
meanings.sent2: The teacher did a quick checkup of the students' understanding.
meanings.sent3: The robot's daily checkup involved scanning for bugs.
meanings.sent4: The security guard's checkup of the building revealed no issues.
meanings.sent5: Regular checkups help prevent problems before they occur.
